EmailTemplate.subject: Compliance Week July Print Edition - Space Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We are working to close the July print edition of Compliance Week and have space available for a full page advertisement on the back cover. This is the most visible position in the magazine.
I’d like to see if you would be interested in the position. Because it's late, we'd be willing to give a nice discount and include 25k online banner impressions at no additional cost.
Rate card for the position is $7,150, I would reduce to $6,250. It would generate nice print and online exposure for your firm. Materials for the print ad would be due by noon tomorrow, Tuesday the 14th (this is a firm deadline). Editorial in the edition will look at:
Defining compliance program effectiveness Spotting the difference between 'significant deficiency' and 'material weakness' Practical implications of the Yates Memo Accounting leaders need a wake-up call on revenue recognition New revenue rules prompt wide variety of adoption strategies The many facets of a data breach Companies now have federal remedy to protect trade secrets SEC’s massive database plan starts to take shape How not to be sanctioned by the World Bank Expanded auditor report: take two Risk reporting to the board Mind the non-GAAP Cyber-security due diligence, a new imperative
Please let me know soon if you have interested, we’re approaching others.
Thanks for your consideration.
April
---------------------------------- April Ramirez Advertising Sales & Events Compliance Week
